import { useState } from 'react' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' const NewTicket = () => { const { user } = useSelector((state) => state.auth) const [name] = useState(user.name) const [email] = useState(user.email) const [product, setProduct] = useState("iPhone") const [description, setDescription] = useState("") const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() } return <>
